text:
Being a new mother 
is hard work though, so it’s 
important to look after yourself 
and try to eat as varied and 
balanced a diet as you can. Aim 
to eat healthily as a family. A 
healthy range of food includes:
• at	least	five	portions	of	a	
variety of fruit and vegetables 
a day (including fresh, frozen, 
tinned, dried and juiced);
• starchy foods such as 
wholemeal bread, pasta, 
rice and potatoes;
• plenty	of	fibre,	found	in	
wholegrain bread and 
breakfast cereals, pasta, 
rice, pulses (su
